about_the_game:
"Urban loneliness." ©

Ocean 17, like other cities, became separated from the land as a result of global warming.



Unable to expand in width, it began to grow upward, building floors one above the other.

Now, on the lower floors of the city, it is almost impossible to see the open sky.

  • Original soundtrack
  • High-quality illustrations in the canonical color palette of the series
  • Continuation of the exciting story about a mysterious city in the middle of the sea
  • Animated backgrounds
  • SFX accompaniment

Adlia is watching you.

Duration
Approximately 2 hours of story and 10+ backgrounds.

Description of adult content

12+
Content in this product may not be appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
